original_body_lines: Ven. Rajangane Saddharathana Thera, a monk who is famous on social media, has been arrested by the police in the Anuradhapura area.

The Buddhist monk was reportedly arrested following a complaint by Ven. Pahiyangala Ananda Sagara Thero regarding the statements made by Ven. Saddharathana Thera, which are harmful to religious harmony.
The CID lauched an investigation after Saddharathana Thera posted a video on YouTube allegedly insulting President Ranil Wickremesinghe.
The investigation was prompted by a video clip that is currently circulating, in which the alleged "monk" can be seen publicly scolding the President using abusive words.
Sources said a special report on the matter has already been submitted to the President's Office.
